data.actual_result: Occasionally the keyboard will not show up
data.expected_result: Keyboard should show up at all times
data.short_description: Keyboard will occasionally not show up when tapping the keyboard icon with or without choosing another option
data.steps_to_repro: - Step 1 - Press the plus sign Step 2.1 - Press the keyboard icon Step 2.2 - Press a different icon that isn't the keyboard Step 3.2 - Press the keyboard icon
